name: A+ Dans Le Bus
description:
For the Global Game Jam of 2021, we had to make a game in 2 days on the theme "Lost, and Found". We play as a student who has a list of objects to find in his house before the bus passes, there is a time limit
Each game is different because of the spawn points of the objects change, the scenery elements will be destructible. Personnaly, this was the first game jam i made in my life. Credits :
Devs : Samuel Barbeau, Loann Courcoul, Timothé Rondeau Graphs : Dylan Dousset, Jules Francioni, Ha-thanh Gore-Koenig Sound Design : Samuel Barbeau, Ha-thanh Gore-Koenig VFX : Samuel Barbeau, Loann Courcoul, Timothé Rondeau
Controls : Movement :
ZQSD or AWSDGrab or Pick
Left Mouse Button
